music21.musicxml.xmlSoundParser¶

Methods for converting <sound> tag to the many different music21 objects that this tag might represent.

Pulled out because xmlToM21 is getting way too big.

SoundTagMixin¶

class music21.musicxml.xmlSoundParser.SoundTagMixin¶

SoundTagMixin methods

SoundTagMixin.soundTagParser(mxSound)¶

Returns a list of objects that represent the sound tag.
